title: Ticket #7458: Indefinite condor_wait busy-waits
description:
A user points out that condor_wait now busy-waits for log activity if -wait is not passed.

There are two problems: the first is that condor_wait thinks that pass a timeout of zero to WaitForUserLog::readEvent() means "wait forever"; the default value in the header implies that the "wait forever" magic value is actually -1.

The second is that -1 no longer waits forever -- when FileModifiedTrigger::wait() was modified to always poll, it lost the ability to wait forever when given a negative timeout.
